text: Red pine or Norway pine, Pinus resinosa, is a pine tree native to North America. Red Pine may also refer to: ==Trees== * Chinese red pine, two species ** Pinus massoniana, Chinese red pine ** Pinus tabuliformis, Southern Chinese red pine * Pinus densiflora, Japanese red pine, a tree native to Japan and Korea * Pinus taiwanensis, Taiwan red pine * Dacrydium cupressinum, New Zealand red pine, a tree endemic to New Zealand ==People== *Red Pine (author), the pen name of author Bill Porter *Chi Song or Master Red Pine (Chinese: 赤松), one of the legendary Taoist immortals
title: Red Pine (disambiguation)
